Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 14th overall pick, by Cleveland in 2015...
Traded from Cleveland to Philadelphia on 3/1/2015 (Going to PHI: C Jose Herrera. Going to CLE: P Mike Stutes)...
Traded from Philadelphia to Toronto on 5/20/2015 (Going to PHI: RF Leonardo Molina. Going to TOR: SS Roman Quinn, C Jose Herrera, P David Palladino)...
Injured on 4/7/2016 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 8/22/2017 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for 6 days...
Injured on 6/25/2019 with a Fractured Knee, out for 9 weeks...
Was claimed off waivers by Cincinnati on 2/14/2022.
Injured on 8/28/2022 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 7 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Arizona on 2/1/2024 to a 3-year deal worth $812,200 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/5/2024, off Markus Rhode (SD)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/19/2024, off To-masu Shihi (MIL)...
Released by Arizona on 4/24/2025...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 5/8/2025 to a minor league contract...
Released by San Francisco on 7/24/2026...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 7/31/2026 to a 1-year deal worth $552,000 per year...
Released by Cleveland on 8/7/2026...
